Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
Rate = (1 / 60)
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop(value.FadeTime) table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Spawn(function() PlayerMouse = Mouse Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Button1Click", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("Button1Click", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn = nil pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "MousePosition" then return ((PlayerMouse and {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target}) or nil) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
EffectScript = script:WaitForChild("EffectScript") PianoScript = script:WaitForChild("PianoScript")
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, Anchored = false, }
Gravity = 196.20
Duration = (60 * 1) ReloadTime = 60
ToolEquipped = false
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ServerControl", Parent = Tool, })
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ClientControl", Parent = Tool, })
Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 0.25) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) local IgnoreList = ((type(IgnoreList) == "table" and IgnoreList) or {IgnoreList}) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function Activated() if not CheckIfAlive() or Humanoid.Sit then return end local MouseData = InvokeClient("MousePosition") if not MouseData then return end local MousePos = MouseData.Position local MouseTarget = MouseData.Target if not MousePos or not MouseTarget then return end local character = MouseTarget.Parent if character:IsA("Accoutrement") then character = character.Parent end if Character:FindFirstChild(PianoScript.Name) or character:FindFirstChild(PianoScript.Name) then return end local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player and IsTeamMate(Player, player) then return end local PlayingPiano = character:FindFirstChild("PlayingPiano") if PlayingPiano then return end local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not torso then return end local hum,ff = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"), character:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not hum or hum.Health <= 0 or ff then return end local DistanceApart = (Handle.Position - torso.Position).Magnitude if DistanceApart > 45 then return end if not Tool.Enabled or not ToolEquipped then return end Tool.Enabled = false local SpawnPosition = torso.CFrame.p local RayHit, SpawnPosition, RayNormal = RayCast(SpawnPosition, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2.5), {Character}) if not RayHit then return end Handle.Transparency = 1 local Values = { {Name = "Creator", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Player}, {Name = "Target", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = character}, {Name = "Position", Class = "CFrameValue", Value = (CFrame.new(SpawnPosition, Vector3.new(Torso.Position.X, SpawnPosition.Y, Torso.Position.Z)) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0))}, } local PianoModel = Create("Model"){ Name = "PianoModel" } local EffectScriptClone = EffectScript:Clone() local PianoScriptClone = PianoScript:Clone() PianoScriptClone.Parent = EffectScriptClone for i, v in pairs(Values) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = EffectScriptClone, } end EffectScriptClone.Disabled = false EffectScriptClone.Parent = PianoModel Debris:AddItem(PianoModel, Duration) PianoModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") wait(ReloadTime) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false end
function OnServerInvoke(player, mode, value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not value or not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" then Handle.Transparency = ((Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) and ((Tool.Enabled and 0) or 1)) or 0) end end)
Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
PianoScript = script:WaitForChild("PianoScript")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
ValueNames = {"Creator", "Target", "Position"} Values = {}
for i, v in pairs(ValueNames) do local Value = script:WaitForChild(v) Values[Value.Name] = Value.Value end
Music = script:WaitForChild("Music")
Gravity = 196.20
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, Anchored = false, }
Piano = BasePart:Clone() Piano.Name = "Piano" Piano.Size = Vector3.new(5.5, 5, 3.5) Piano.Friction = 2 Piano.Elasticity = 0 Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "332661198"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "332661035"), Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = Piano, } Garland = Piano:Clone() Garland.Name = "Garland" Garland.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 1) Garland.CanCollide = false Garland.Mesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "332661106") GarlandMotor = Create("Motor6D"){ Name = "Motor", Part0 = Piano, Part1 = Garland, C0 = (CFrame.new(0, 2.375, -0.25) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)), C1 = (CFrame.new(0, 0.75, 0.5) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)), CurrentAngle = 0, DesiredAngle = 0, MaxVelocity = 0.1, Parent = Garland, } Ornaments = Piano:Clone() Ornaments.Name = "Ornaments" Ornaments.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Ornaments.CanCollide = false Ornaments.Mesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "332661152") OrnamentsMotor = Create("Motor6D"){ Name = "Motor", Part0 = Piano, Part1 = Ornaments, C0 = (CFrame.new(-0.075, 2.75, 0.75) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)), C1 = (CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)), CurrentAngle = 0, DesiredAngle = 0, MaxVelocity = 0.1, Parent = Ornaments, } Garland.Parent = Piano Ornaments.Parent = Piano
PossibleMusic = {} for i, v in pairs(Music:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Sound") then local Length = v:FindFirstChild("Length") if Length:IsA("NumberValue") and Length.Value > 0 then table.insert(PossibleMusic, v) end end end
SelectedSound = PossibleMusic[math.random(1, #PossibleMusic)]:Clone() SelectedSound.Name = "Music" SelectedSound.Parent = Piano PianoSound = SelectedSound:Clone()
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "creator", Value = player, } Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) local IgnoreList = ((type(IgnoreList) == "table" and IgnoreList) or {IgnoreList}) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function Clamp(Number, Min, Max) return math.max(math.min(Max, Number), Min) end
function GetPercentage(Start, End, Number) return (((Number - Start) / (End - Start)) * 100) end
function Round(Number, RoundDecimal) local WholeNumber, Decimal = math.modf(Number) return ((Decimal >= RoundDecimal and math.ceil(Number)) or (Decimal < RoundDecimal and math.floor(Number)) or Number) end
function CreateEffect(Position) local SpawnLocation = (Position + Vector3.new(0, 250, 0)) local DisplayPiano = Piano:Clone() local BodyGyro = Create("BodyGyro"){ maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge), Parent = DisplayPiano, } local BodyVelocity = Create("BodyVelocity"){ maxForce = Vector3.new(0, (Piano:GetMass() * Gravity), 0), velocity = Vector3.new(0, -150, 0), Parent = DisplayPiano, } DisplayPiano.CFrame = (SpawnLocation * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)) BodyGyro.cframe = DisplayPiano.CFrame local BodyPosition = Create("BodyPosition"){ maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge), position = DisplayPiano.CFrame.p, Parent = DisplayPiano, } Debris:AddItem(DisplayPiano, 60) DisplayPiano.Parent = Model local ValueObjects = { {Name = "Creator", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Values.Creator}, {Name = "Model", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Model}, {Name = "Object", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = DisplayPiano}, {Name = "Hit", Class = "BoolValue", Value = false}, {Name = "Remove", Class = "BoolValue", Value = false}, } local PianoScriptCopy = PianoScript:Clone() local DisableObject, HitObject, RemoveObject for i, v in pairs(ValueObjects) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = PianoScriptCopy, } if v.Name == "Object" then DisableObject = Value elseif v.Name == "Hit" then HitObject = Value elseif v.Name == "Remove" then RemoveObject = Value end end PianoScriptCopy.Disabled = false PianoScriptCopy.Parent = Values.Target Garland = DisplayPiano.Garland GarlandMotor = Garland.Motor Ornaments = DisplayPiano.Ornaments OrnamentsMotor = Ornaments.Motor RunService.Stepped:connect(function() local GarlandSpeed = {Min = 0, Max = 5} local Velocity = ((DisplayPiano.Velocity * Vector3.new(0, 1, 0))) local GarlandVelocity = (Clamp(GetPercentage(0, 100, Velocity.Magnitude), 0, 100) * 0.01) local RotationSpeed = Clamp((GarlandSpeed.Max * GarlandVelocity), GarlandSpeed.Min, GarlandSpeed.Max) local StartPoint = (DisplayPiano.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * (DisplayPiano.Size.Y / 2)) local EndPoint = (StartPoint + Velocity.Unit * Velocity.Magnitude) local MoveDirection = Clamp(((StartPoint.p - EndPoint.p).Unit + EndPoint.lookVector).Magnitude, 0, 2) local Direction = ((MoveDirection < 1 and 1) or -1) GarlandMotor.MaxVelocity = Clamp(math.abs(RotationSpeed * 0.01), 0.1, 1) OrnamentsMotor.MaxVelocity = Clamp(math.abs(RotationSpeed * 0.01), 0.1, 1) if math.floor(Velocity.Y) == 0 then GarlandMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 OrnamentsMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 else GarlandMotor.DesiredAngle = (2 * GarlandVelocity) OrnamentsMotor.DesiredAngle = (1 * GarlandVelocity * Direction) end end) local StartTick = tick() while DisplayPiano and DisplayPiano.Parent and (tick() - StartTick) < 10 do local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = RayCast(DisplayPiano.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), ((DisplayPiano.Size.Y / 2) + 0.25), {}) if (RayHit and DisplayPiano.Velocity.Magnitude < 10) or RayHit and DisplayPiano.Velocity.Magnitude < 5 then break end wait(0.00001) end if DisplayPiano and DisplayPiano.Parent then local EnemyHead = Values.Target:FindFirstChild("Head") if EnemyHead and DisplayPiano.Position.Y > EnemyHead.Position.Y and (DisplayPiano.Position - EnemyHead.Position).Magnitude <= (DisplayPiano.Size.Y) then if HitObject then HitObject.Value = true end local PianoCFrame = DisplayPiano.CFrame local Seat = Create("Seat"){ Name = "Seat", Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), Locked = true, CanCollide = true, Anchored = false, Size = Vector3.new(5, 1.125, 1.75), } Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "111868131"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "111867655"), Scale = Vector3.new(1, 0.5, 0.5), Parent = Seat, } local SeatOffset = (CFrame.new(0, -2, -((Seat.Size.Z / 2) + (Piano.Size.Z / 2))) * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi, 0)) Seat.CFrame = (DisplayPiano.CFrame * SeatOffset) local SeatWeld = Create("Weld"){ Part0 = DisplayPiano, Part1 = Seat, C0 = SeatOffset, C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = Seat, } local BodyGyro = Create("BodyGyro"){ maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge), cframe = Seat.CFrame, Parent = Seat, } local BodyPosition = Create("BodyPosition"){ maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge), position = Seat.CFrame.p, Parent = Seat, } Seat.Parent = Model local CreatorCharacter = Values.Creator.Character if CreatorCharacter and CreatorCharacter.Parent then local CreatorHumanoid = CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") local CreatorTorso = CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if CreatorHumanoid and CreatorHumanoid.Health > 0 and CreatorTorso then local PlayingPiano = Create("BoolValue"){ Name = "PlayingPiano", Value = true, } PianoSound = DisplayPiano.Music local TimeLength = PianoSound.Length.Value Debris:AddItem(PlayingPiano, (TimeLength + 3)) PlayingPiano.Parent = CreatorCharacter local SeatWeld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "SeatWeld", Part0 = Seat, Part1 = CreatorTorso, C0 = CFrame.new(0, (Seat.Size.Y / 2), 0), C1 = CFrame.new(0, -1.5, 0), Parent = Seat, } CreatorHumanoid.Sit = true SeatWeld.Changed:Connect(function(Property) if not SeatWeld.Parent or not SeatWeld.Part0 or not SeatWeld.Part1 then DestroyModel() end end) PianoSound:Play() local TimeToFade = 3 local FadeRate = 0.05 wait(TimeLength - TimeToFade) local OrigVolume = PianoSound.Volume for i = 1, (TimeToFade / FadeRate) do wait(FadeRate) PianoSound.Volume = (OrigVolume - (i / (TimeToFade / FadeRate))) end PianoSound:Stop() if DisableObject then DisableObject.Value = nil end wait(0.25) else RemoveObject.Value = true end else RemoveObject.Value = true end else RemoveObject.Value = true end else RemoveObject.Value = true end end
function DestroyModel(Delay) PianoSound:Stop() wait(0.5) --Hacky way to ensure the sound has stopped... if Delay then Debris:AddItem(Model, 1) else Model:Destroy() end end
if not Values.Creator or not Values.Creator:IsA("Player") or not Values.Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Character = Values.Creator.Character if not Character then DestroyModel() return end
Values.Creator.Changed:Connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Values.Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Character.Changed:Connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
CreateEffect(Values.Position)
DestroyModel()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator") Model = script:WaitForChild("Model") Object = script:WaitForChild("Object") Hit = script:WaitForChild("Hit") Remove = script:WaitForChild("Remove")
BackpackMonitor = script:WaitForChild("BackpackMonitor") BackpackDisabler = script:WaitForChild("BackpackDisabler") DisableScripts = script:WaitForChild("DisableScripts")
AnimationPlaying = false
Animations = { FlailingR6 = script:WaitForChild("FlailingR6"), FlailingR15 = script:WaitForChild("FlailingR15") }
function DestroyScript() for i, v in pairs({BodyPosition, ToolAdded, ModelChanged, ObjectChanged, HitChanged, RemoveChanged}) do if v then if tostring(v) == "Connection" then v:disconnect() elseif v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end end if FlailAnim then FlailAnim:Stop() end if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Humanoid.AutoRotate = true end Debris:AddItem(script, 0.5) return end
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then DestroyScript() return end
BodyPosition = Create("BodyPosition"){ MaxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge), Position = Torso.Position, Parent = Torso }
ModelChanged = Model.Value.Changed:Connect(function() if not Model.Value or not Model.Value.Parent then DestroyScript() return end end)
ObjectChanged = Object.Value.Changed:Connect(function() if not Object.Value or not Object.Value.Parent then DestroyScript() return end end)
HitChanged = Hit.Changed:Connect(function() if Hit.Value and not AnimationPlaying then AnimationPlaying = true if Player then local BackpackMonitorCopy = BackpackMonitor:Clone() local Values = { {Name = "Creator", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Player}, {Name = "Model", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Model.Value}, } for i, v in pairs(Values) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = BackpackMonitorCopy, } end BackpackMonitorCopy.Disabled = false BackpackMonitorCopy.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Humanoid:UnequipTools() ToolAdded = Character.ChildAdded:Connect(function(Child) wait() if Child:IsA("Tool") then Humanoid:UnequipTools() end end) local BackpackDisablerCopy = BackpackDisabler:Clone() BackpackDisablerCopy.Disabled = false BackpackDisablerCopy.Parent = Character end AnimationPlaying = true FlailAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations["Flailing"..Humanoid.RigType.Name]) FlailAnim:Play(nil, nil, 2) elseif not Hit.Value and AnimationPlaying then AnimationPlaying = false if FlailAnim then FlailAnim:Stop() end end end)
RemoveChanged = Remove.Changed:Connect(function() if Remove.Value then DestroyScript() return end end)
for i, v in pairs(DisableScripts:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BaseScript") then local ScriptCopy = v:Clone() ScriptCopy.Disabled = false ScriptCopy.Parent = script end end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Humanoid.AutoRotate = false

--Made by Luckymaxer
DisableScript = script.Parent
Character = DisableScript.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
DisableJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
DisableScript = script.Parent
Character = DisableScript.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
DisableJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator") Model = script:WaitForChild("Model")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BackpackEnabler = script:WaitForChild("BackpackEnabler")
function EnableBackpack() if Creator.Parent then for i, v in pairs({Creator.Character, Creator:FindFirstChild("Backpack"), Creator:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui")}) do if v and v.Parent then local BackpackEnablerCopy = BackpackEnabler:Clone() BackpackEnablerCopy.Disabled = false BackpackEnablerCopy.Parent = v end end end Debris:AddItem(script, 1) end
if Creator.Value and Creator.Value:IsA("Player") then Creator = Creator.Value Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" or Property == "Character" then EnableBackpack() end end) end
if Model.Value then Model = Model.Value Model.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Model.Parent then EnableBackpack() end end) end

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris") StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)
Debris:AddItem(script, 1)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris") StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)
Debris:AddItem(script, 1)
